warning_signs: chest pain not relieved by antacids
self_care: do not lie down immediately after meals

warning_signs: severe pain in lower right abdomen
chest pain lasting more than 10 minutes
pain spreading to left arm or jaw
severe chest pain lasting more than 5 minutes
pain spreading to arm, jaw, or back
self_care: keep the patient calm and seated
rest in a dark quiet room
avoid bright light and loud noise
sit or lie down during dizziness
seek medical help if pain increases
drink fluids and take adequate rest
avoid lying down immediately after eating
use warm compress for pain relief
track menstrual cycle and pain patterns

track menstrual cycle and pain patterns
do not put anything in mouth
rinse with clean water if possible
avoid very hot or cold foods
